reasons_to_visit.details: November offers the most genuine local atmosphere with minimal tourist presence.
Peak cultural season with excellent opera, theater, and classical music programming.
Perfect time to experience Prague's famous café culture and traditional beer halls.
Late November sees early Christmas market preparations and holiday decorations.
Lower accommodation prices and fewer crowds make for affordable luxury experiences.

reasons_to_avoid.details: November can be overcast and gloomy with limited sunshine and frequent drizzle.
Very limited daylight hours restrict outdoor activity timing.
Chilly weather requires warm clothing and limits comfortable outdoor time.
